Texts.Chs: 我的上司要求我给予补偿。补偿我的所作所为。那可怕的、不可言说的东西破坏了叶族人的一切准则，那玩意甚至在我这个遥远的国度里，我也无法提及。谁会先找到我？
Texts.Eng: My superiors demand recompense. Recompense for what I've done. That terrible, unspeakable thing which breaks every Floran code, that which even in my distant state, I cannot bring myself to mention. Who will find me first?

Texts.Chs: 他们很快就会来找我，但谁能先找到我呢？我的亲人，拿着矛和刀，叫嚣着要血债血偿？或者是橡木战士，他们行进着来收回我，把我带回他们的怀抱。
Texts.Eng: Soon they will come for me, but who shall reach me first? My kin, with their spears and knives, baying for blood? Or the oaken soldiers, marching to reclaim me, to bring me back into their fold.
